original_text: So Moses said to Israel’s judges, “Each of you must put to death those of your people who have yoked themselves to the Baal of Peor.”
korean_text: 모세가 이스라엘 재판관들에게 이르되 너희는 각각 바알브올에게 가담한 사람들을 죽이라 하니라

sentences.original_text: So Moses said to Israel's judges
Each of you must put to death
who have yoked themselves to the Baal of Peor
